hadiths.text: Abu Sa'id al Khudri reported:I visited the Apostle (ﷺ) and saw him praying on a reed mat on which he was prostrating himself. And I saw him praying in a single garment with ends crossed with each other

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي ثَوْبٍ وَاحِدٍ وَصِفَةِ لُبْسِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Praying In A Single Garment, And How It Should Be Worn
